forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 57F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: More clouds than sun. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
